meanings.definition: Excessive focus or concentration on something.
meanings.sent1: Her overattentions on her phone caused her to miss the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: His overattentions to detail made him a great detective.
meanings.sent3: The cat's overattentions to the laser pointer provided endless entertainment for the family.
meanings.sent4: The overattentions of the audience were captured by the magician's mesmerizing tricks.
meanings.sent5: The overattentions of the students were evident as they eagerly listened to the teacher's every word.

meanings.definition: The act of paying too much attention to a particular thing.
meanings.sent1: The overattentions of the child on the toy aisle led to a tantrum when he couldn't have everything.
meanings.sent2: Her overattentions to her appearance made her late for the party.
meanings.sent3: The overattentions of the dog to the squirrel outside made him forget about his bone.
meanings.sent4: The overattentions of the chef to the recipe resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The overattentions of the driver to his phone caused him to miss the turn.
